member.name: T:Acnur.App.Aplication.Enumerators.ExceptionHandlingPolitic
member.summary: Defines the exception handling politics to use.

member.name: F:Acnur.App.Aplication.Enumerators.ExceptionHandlingPolitic.Propagate
member.summary: Represents the propagation politic. This politic specifies that every exception will be passed to the caller without any transformation.

member.name: F:Acnur.App.Aplication.Enumerators.ExceptionHandlingPolitic.Wrap
member.summary: Represents the wrap politic. This politic specifies that every exception will be wrapped inside another exception and then passed to the caller.

member.name: F:Acnur.App.Aplication.Enumerators.ExceptionHandlingPolitic.Replace
member.summary: Represents the replacement politic. This politic specifies that every exception will be replaced for another exception; then the new exception will be passed to the caller.
member.remarks: The original exception will be lost.
